* File Name : almostPrime.cpp

............................................*/
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t ;
	scanf("%d",&t);
 
	for(int p = 0 ; p < t ; p++){
		long long int n ;
		scanf("%lld",&n) ;
 		long long int i;
		int flag = 0 ;
		long long int m ;
		m = sqrt(n) ;
		if(m*m == n && m != 1 && m%2 != 0){
			for(i=2;i<=m/2;i++){
				if(m%i == 0){
					flag = 1 ;
					break ;
				}
			}
			if(flag == 1){
				printf("NO\n") ;
			} else {
				printf("YES\n") ;
			}
		} else if(n==4){
			printf("YES\n") ;

		} else {
			printf("NO\n") ;
		}
	}
	return 0 ;
}
